Package com.satori.rtm.connection

Classes related to the RTM connection for sending and receiving PDUs and JSON serializer.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionListener
    Defines listener methods for changes in connection state.
    Serializer
    General interface for JSON serializer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    Access RTM at the connection level to connect, send and receive PDUs, and wait for responses.
    GsonSerializer
    JSON serialization based on google-gson library.
    StaticJsonBinder  

Package com.satori.rtm.connection Description

Classes related to the RTM connection for sending and receiving PDUs and JSON serializer.
